column1: description
Whoever’s fault it was, a heated conversation with a stranger turned into a full-blown fight. Perform a CON check or get badly beaten up and robbed of D20 DC.
You make a fool out of yourself. People will mock you from now on when you visit the same locale.
You intervened and stopped an ugly situation before it started. You got free drinks for the rest of the night.
You did way too many drugs last night. Your CON is reduced by 1 for the next week.
The details are blurry, but someone gifted you a traditional Chinese gong.
You met a person who insisted on giving you a lecture on the EM drive’s inner workings. +1 Technology.
You just discovered you’re terribly allergic to something new. What was it?
You won a long, intense game of poker. +50 DC.
You wake up in a stranger’s bed, alone. There’s nobody else in these private quarters.
You played a few games. Lost them all. -D20 DC.
You accidentally caused a small fire. Fortunately, the KSA doesn’t seem to be aware it was you.
You got a tattoo. It’s okay.
You wake up in your bed, somehow 2D20 DC poorer.
You helped someone. Now they owe you one.
You had a minor misunderstanding with a KSA agent. Perform a CHA check or pay a 50 DC fine.
You joined a funeral celebration. Another crew who didn’t make it back.
You made a stupid promise to someone in public, which you can’t take back.
You dramatically changed something about your appearance.
You felt terrible and spent the night having visions about supernovas, planets being destroyed and choruses of desperate screams.
You spent hours discussing the meaning of life with a total stranger. It made you feel motivated, despite it all. +1 Resolve.
You partook in a series of religious ceremonies—some bizarre practices that a few folks have started developing on Karum Station. You’re unsure what to think.
You wake up in the Garden (pg 343), sleepily rolling over flowers that probably cost thousands of DC. You better get out of here fast.
You wake up with a small item in your pocket. Roll a D6: [1–2] ring, [3–4] necklace, [5–6] earring.
You fall in love.
Someone helped you out big time. You owe them a favor. -1 WIL on all Skill checks for the next 2 cycles.
You wake up with a massive hangover. -2 to all Skill checks for the next 2 cycles.
You spend the night listening to the terrible, wondrous tales of a famous Diver. They have several missions to their name, but never managed to get a big break.
You spend a fantastic night in the District (pg 345). Lose 20 Stress and 30 DC.
You had a great time casually playing cards with some friends. +1 Luck.
You spend a few hours training at the gym. Next time you enter combat, you have +3 Stamina in your first turn.
You’ve been hypnotized. Each time someone says the word “tentacle” you laugh maniacally.
You wake up with an extra D20 DC in your account. A subconscious discomfort says you shouldn’t investigate where they came from.
You wake up completely naked inside a public bathroom.
You spend half of all your savings in the party to end all parties. People you don’t know greet you on the streets for weeks.
You ate something bad. -1 CON for the next day.
You somehow gained access to one of the spaceship research centers. There’s a blank space in your memory, but you are haunted by visions of rendered flesh and pumping blood. You gain 10 Stress.
